title: Tyson Foods Inc. Recalls Breaded Chicken Products Due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, June 8, 2018 Tyson Foods Inc., a North Little Rock, Ark. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,120 pounds of frozen breaded chicken products that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, specifically blue and clear soft plastic, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
